data.title: Olu Jacobs And Wife, Joke Siva Celebrate 35th Wedding Anniversary
data.meta_description:
By Nwafor Chidera
Veteran Nollywood actress, Joke Silva has taken to her Instagram pages to celebrate her 35th wedding anniversary with her husband and col...
data.text:
By Nwafor Chidera

Veteran Nollywood actress, Joke Silva has taken to her Instagram pages to celebrate her 35th wedding anniversary with her husband and colleague, Olu Jacobs today, November 16th.

The actress shared a lovely photo of herself and her husband as she expresses her gratitude to God for getting them this far.

"ðŸ™ˆtotally forgot. ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…...ðŸ¥‚ 35 years together...thank you Lord. Here is to many more. Happy wedding anniversary Omo boy @_olujacobs," she wrote.

The celebrity couple is considered one of the couples to look up to in the movie industry as their love for each other continues to wax stronger despite their age.
